# looker_folder (Resource)

## Example Usage
```terraform
resource "looker_folder" "folder" {
  name = "BE"
}
```

## Example Output
```terraform
% terraform show
# looker_folder.folder
resource "looker_folder" "folder" {
  id   = "1"
  name = "BE"
}
```
